title: नहीं, हार्दिक पटेल को थप्पड़ मारने वाला व्यक्ति कांग्रेस पार्टी का सदस्य नहीं है
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: Tarun Gajjar: Then again during his rally in Ahmedabad when I had gone to get medicine for my child, everything was shut down. He shuts down the roads, he shuts down Gujarat whenever he wants to, What is he? Gujarat’s hitler? (2/2) https://t.co/QXo30wJmAB
